name: Shrouded (Digital Bros Game Academy)
description:
Shrouded is a project developed by our students during the 2020/21 academic year for The Big One project in collaboration with Lunar Great Wall Studios.

Navigate through the desert and survive the horrible sandstorm that is destroying the land in this cooperative adventure.

Find resources, craft and manage your ship. Cooperate with your fellow Nomad to survive as long as you can.

Along the way, meet other survivors, discover forgotten places and face terrible dangers.

●     A journey of exploration and survival through a procedurally generated desert.

●     Cooperate with your fellow Nomad to manage your ship past the sandstorm.

●     Explore a torned mystic land going through both cursed and blessed locations. Make your choices and face the consequences.

●     Choose between three different Nomad archetypes, each with its strengths and weaknesses.
